title: How to create a bootable Windows 7 USB flash drive
description:
SEEDING WILL BE SLOW..PLZZ DO SEED AFTER DOWNLOADING THE TORRENT..

-------------------------------------------------------------------


This guide works 100% for WINDOWS 7.

[*]Can also be used for WINDOWS 8.

[*]This Guide Includes two different ways to create a BOOTABLE USB FLASH DRIVE :


1.Windows 7 USB DVD Download Tool.

Download It From Here -->Windows 7 USB DVD Download Tool


2.Manual Creation Using Command Prompt (cmd).

-------------------------------------------------------------------

Requirements:

[*]USB Flash Drive (Minimum 4GB)

[*]Prefer 8GB or Larger size USB FLASH DRIVE If the ISO file(WINDOWS 7 Installtion File) is larger than 4GB.

[*]WINDOWS 7 Installation files(ISO file).

-------------------------------------------------------------------

Steps :

To Create BOOTABLE WINDOWS 7 USB DRIVE.

1. Plug-in your USB FLASH DRIVE to USB PORT and move all the contents from USB DRIVE to a safe location on your SYSTEM or other USB FLASH DRIVE if available.

2. Open Command Prompt with ADMIN rights by Typing 'cmd' in START MENU search box and hit Ctrl+ Shift+ Enter.

----------------------------
